title: Personal Business Made Social
itunes:title: Personal Business Made Social
description:
Today on the show we opened up the phone lines to see if our listeners like to put their personal business on blast after video recordings of Dababy and Dani Leigh's relationship spilled all over social media. Also, we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners get jealous when their partner goes out with their friends without them, after a clip from the show “Marriage Boot Camp” popped up of N.O.R.E getting jealous of his wife going out. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a pharmacy who gave 112 kids the wrong doses of COVID vaccine.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
